import seaborn as sns

import plotly.graph_objs as go

    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

#Codes by Iván Hernández Cazorla https://www.kaggle.com/ivanhercaz/museums-in-tenerife-location-map

fig_px = px.scatter_mapbox(df, lat="Latitude", lon="Longitude",
                           hover_name="State",
                           zoom=11, height=300)
fig_px.update_layout(mapbox_style="open-street-map",
                     margin={"r":0,"t":0,"l":0,"b":0})

fig_px.show()

source.111ef04a:
Nigeria LGAs and Wards.

Nigeria has 774 Local Government Areas (LGAs) with each LGA being administered by a Local Government Council consisting of a Chairman, who is the Chief Executive of the LGA, and other elected members referred to as Councillors. Each of the LGAs is further subdivided into a minimum of 10 and a maximum of 20 Wards. Each Ward is being administered by a Councillor who directly reports to the LGA Chairman. The Councillors fall under the legislative arm of the local government.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Local_government_areas_of_Nigeria
